title: Season 4 MMR get transferred into season 5?
body: Is your season 5 mmr somewhat similar to your season 4 mmr or is it all just completely reset?

replies.body: It's somewhat similar. The players which you are matched with will be based off of your ranking in the previous season, meaning if you were silver in season 4, most of your placements will act as though you had the average mmr of a silver 3 player when deciding on who to match you with.
